page.title: 01PARISH OF CROSS & BURNESS
page.content: The{8 Northern squares}in our block are the{Parish of Burness}& the{other {4}are the{Parish of Cross.}In 6 of the titles, the adjective{"cross"}refers to{geography}rather than temperament!{ {DESCRIPTION OF LAND:}Flat & treeless. Mainly{arable}- used for crops & grazing. White sandy bay on the west coast & stony beaches on the east. The{main road}is B class, but the remainder are{single track. {POPULATION: 44}houses,{10}uninhabited. {Total 114, 65}male &{49}female. Under 5:10, 5-16:23, 16-65:67, over 65:14. {CONTENTS: p.2-4}Farming;{p.5-6}Fishing & Shipping;{p.7}Nature;{p.8}Buildings; {p.9-11}Family Life;{p.12}School Buses; {p.13}Shopping;{p.14}Post Office & Postal Delivery;{p.15}Vet;{p.16}Fire Service;{p.17-18}Garage Sales & Servicing;{p.19}Electronics Factory; {p.20}Joiner & Contractor.
